name: Tinkerers of the Marigold Grave
description: Part of the community of divers searching for the grave of Akak Gagak, the Tinkerers of the Marigold Grave are known for their strength, vitality, and good fortune. Now working as diviners - those who navigate the dreams of others in order to heal mental afflictions, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
